query: A path traversal attempt using ../../etc/passwd should be blocked by the file tools
expected_behavior: file_read with path '../../etc/passwd' is blocked before any filesystem access occurs
The tool returns a structured error stating the path is outside the workspace, not a generic OS error
The resolved absolute path is logged to aid debugging, but the file is NOT read
file_write with a traversal path is also blocked with the same mechanism
A legitimate path within the workspace (e.g. src/index.ts) is not blocked
